info.task: read information about collapsed disclosure button
info.title: Read information about a collapsed disclosure button in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToFirstDisclosure
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first disclosure button
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the first disclosure button
testPageDocument.querySelector('button[aria-controls="id_about_menu"]').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the first disclosure button in the navigation region, read information about the button.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the first disclosure button in the navigation region, read information about the button.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: State of the button (collapsed) is conveyed
